mcq.statement: Choose an option that is correct according to the standard use of English: On page 3 there is an advertisement of a new video camera.

options.a: On page 3 there is an advertisement of a new video camera.
options.b: On page 3, there is an advertisement about a new video camera.
options.c: On page 3, there is an advertisement for a new video camera.
options.d: On page 3, there is advertisement for new video camera.
